alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 6:21PM EDT until July 28 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 620 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Canadohta Lake to near Lincolnville to near Guys Mills, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph winicevid gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. There have been a few reports of tree and power-line damage from these thunderstorms. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Titusville, Riceville, Canadohta Lake, Guys Mills, Lincolnville, Hydetown, Blooming Valley, Townville and Spartansburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to flash flooding. Never drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
